title: Elyse Knowles gives fans a glimpse into her lavish Byron Bay beach house
text:
She's one of Australia's most famous models, and on Thursday, Elyse Knowles gave fans a rare glimpse inside her personal life.

Taking to Instagram Stories, the 27-year-old Myer ambassador shared a series of photos and videos from inside her lavish beach home.

In one of the stories, Elyse can be heard showing off her new pot plant to two of her decidedly uninterested dogs.

Scroll down for video

Loving life: On Thursday, Elyse Knowles (pictured) gave fans a rare glimpse inside her personal life

But as the camera panned around the room, she gave her fans a peek inside her light and airy home.

Using a neutral colour palette, the home features distressed wooden furnishings with antique accents.

'Girls, do you like my olive tree? Do you? We have a tree in the house!' she excitedly informed her dogs.

Showing it off: Taking to Instagram Stories, the 27-year-old Myer ambassador shared a series of photos and videos from inside her lavish beach home

Elyse made the move to Byron Bay in far north New South Wales with her longtime boyfriend Josh Barker earlier this year.

And the couple is clearly embracing the beach life, with a surfboard seen hanging overhead in their living room.

The home is decorated in a modern rustic style, and has sleek, minimalist in its furnishings.

Sea change: Elyse made the move to Byron Bay in far north New South Wales with her longtime boyfriend Josh Barker earlier this year

Even the overhead lighting is housed in a large basket fitting, adding to the worn and stylish design of the home.

Building on the nature theme is the extensive use of plants, with the new addition of a potted olive tree placed against the wall.

The stylish design choices are no surprise from the couple that became famous after they appeared on the hit renovation show The Block back in 2017.

Going pro: The stylish design choices are no surprise from the couple that became famous after they appeared on the hit renovation show The Block back in 2017

In September, Elyse spoke about her new life in the coastal town and revealed what her famous neighbours, Chris Hemsworth and Elsa Pataky, were really like.

Appearing on The Morning Show, the 27-year-old model said she usually sees the Hollywood couple at the beach, where the A-listers are often surfing or walking their dog.

She said the famous couple are just like everyone else, despite their star status.

Stylish: Using a neutral colour palette, the home features distressed wooden furnishings with antique accents

'I see Elsa and Chris sometimes, going out for a surf, Josh has surfed with him, or Elsa walking the dog,' Elyse said.

'They are like every other human, they're just living their best life possible in a very positive community where everyone lets everyone in and lets everyone thrive for who they are.'

She added: 'It's a very positive, happy community and we all focus on sustainability as well so it's great.'
description: She's one of Australia's most famous models, and on Thursday, Elyse Knowles gave fans a rare glimpse inside her personal life.
authors: Tom Place For Daily Mail Australia
